channel.title: How do you make the pickup cmd for only owners?
channel.description: where do i change it at?

item.title: How do you make the pickup cmd for only owners?
item.dc:creator: @Raams Raams
item.description:
@Raams wrote:

[quote=“Mr. Despair, post:2, topic:331129”] if (command.startsWith("pickup") && playerRights > 1) {

In client.java search pickup until you find something that looks like this and replace the whole pickup code with the one above and compile.[/quote]

Or a better way to put all commands under owner:

if (playerRights >= 2) {
   if (command.equals("pickup") {
         Enter stuff here
   }
}

Read full topic
item.source: How do you make the pickup cmd for only owners?
